LanguageData.Architect28.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] розробляє та споруджує будівлі. У Блискосвіті, більшістю технічних аспектів архітектури керували ШІ. Завдяки цьому [PAWN_possessive] {INITIATOR_gender ? міг : могла} приділяти максимум уваги до процесу творення, та ніколи не приймати участі під час будівництва.
LanguageData.Architect28.title: архітектор
LanguageData.BiosphereManager95.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] жи{INITIATOR_gender ? в : ла} у прекрасному Блискосвіті, де роботи виконували усю чорну роботу за людей і ті могли присвятити свій час на дозвілля. [PAWN_pronoun] контролюва{INITIATOR_gender ? в : ла} флору, живність та системи поливу у ботанічних садах, щоб городяни могли насолоджуватися природньою красою.
LanguageData.BiosphereManager95.title: менеджер біосфер
LanguageData.CharityWorker36.baseDesc: Блискосвіт, це рай для тих, кому пощастило тут жити, проте [PAWN_nameDef] не {INITIATOR_gender ? міг : могла} ігнорувати сусідні планети, де люди потерпали у бідності. [PAWN_pronoun] присвяти{INITIATOR_gender ? в : ла} увесь власний робочий час на допомогу та підтримку тих, хто цього потребує.
LanguageData.CharityWorker36.title: благодійний працівник
LanguageData.GlitterworldEmpath26.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had an amazing ability to relate to others and mediate conflict. [PAWN_pronoun] was selected to train as an empath. The training intensified [PAWN_possessive] natural abilities, but [PAWN_pronoun] became unable to harm others.
LanguageData.GlitterworldEmpath26.title: glitterworld empath
LanguageData.GlitterworldOfficer60.baseDesc: Though glitterworlds are peaceful places, they often remain prepared for war. [PAWN_nameDef]'s unit rarely saw any real action.\n\nThough [PAWN_pronoun] pursued [PAWN_possessive] artistic hobbies, [PAWN_possessive] subordinates preferred to entertain themselves by brawling, so [PAWN_nameDef] got good at breaking up fights.
LanguageData.GlitterworldOfficer60.title: glitterworld officer
LanguageData.GlitterworldSurgeon15.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a surgeon on a world mostly free of disease and human suffering.\n\n[PAWN_possessive] job mostly involved elaborate and creative cosmetic surgeries. [PAWN_pronoun] has a good understanding of human biology, but never had to remove a cancer — or a bullet.
LanguageData.GlitterworldSurgeon15.title: glitterworld surgeon
LanguageData.NavyScientist52.baseDesc: Interstellar warfare is won by technology, so glitterworld navies are always on the peak of modern research. Even better, they have first access to archotechnological artifacts because they find them in space.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] worked in a navy lab.
LanguageData.NavyScientist52.title: navy scientist
LanguageData.Novelist7.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lived on a glitterworld, penning wildly successful novels. [PAWN_pronoun] lived a carefree lifestyle, spending [PAWN_possessive] days writing and [PAWN_possessive] nights partying - and never did a day's manual labour in [PAWN_possessive] life.
LanguageData.Novelist7.title: novelist
LanguageData.Sculptor63.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] started off sculpting person-sized chunks of stone, but [PAWN_pronoun] soon began to think bigger. With the help of mining robots, [PAWN_pronoun] learned how to carve huge monuments out of cliffsides. Soon the nature parks of the glitterworld where [PAWN_pronoun] lived were full of giant rock figures.
LanguageData.Sculptor63.title: скульптор
LanguageData.VRDesigner87.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] designed virtual reality simulations for glitterworld citizens. [PAWN_pronoun] paid great attention to the details of [PAWN_possessive] worlds, including learning all [PAWN_pronoun] could about plant life to make [PAWN_possessive] landscapes more realistic.
LanguageData.VRDesigner87.title: Дизайнер VR
